<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory"></a>

# EditorFileSystemDirectory

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

A directory for the resource filesystem.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A more generalized, low-level variation of the directory concept.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_find_dir_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **find_dir_index**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_find_dir_index)

Returns the index of the directory with name `name` or ``-1`` if not found.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_find_file_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **find_file_index**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_find_file_index)

Returns the index of the file with name `name` or ``-1`` if not found.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_file**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file)

Returns the name of the file at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_file_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_count)

Returns the number of files in this directory.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_import_is_valid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_file_import_is_valid**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_import_is_valid)

Returns ``true`` if the file at index `idx` imported properly.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_file_path**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_path)

Returns the path to the file at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_script_class_extends"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_file_script_class_extends**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_script_class_extends)

Returns the base class of the script class defined in the file at index `idx`. If the file doesn't define a script class using the ``class_name`` syntax, this will return an empty string.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_script_class_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_file_script_class_name**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_script_class_name)

Returns the name of the script class defined in the file at index `idx`. If the file doesn't define a script class using the ``class_name`` syntax, this will return an empty string.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_type"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_file_type**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_file_type)

Returns the resource type of the file at index `idx`. This returns a string such as ``"Resource"`` or ``"GDScript"``, *not* a file extension such as ``".gd"``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_name**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_name)

Returns the name of this directory.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_parent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[EditorFileSystemDirectory](EditorFileSystemDirectory.md) **get_parent**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_parent)

Returns the parent directory for this directory or ``null`` if called on a directory at ``res://`` or ``user://``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_path**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_path)

Returns the path to this directory.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_subdir"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[EditorFileSystemDirectory](EditorFileSystemDirectory.md) **get_subdir**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_subdir)

Returns the subdirectory at index `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_subdir_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_subdir_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorFileSystemDirectory_method_get_subdir_count)

Returns the number of subdirectories in this directory.
